entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Adding `_` (discard) in front of evaluation auto-completes to first symbol name match for `_` (underscore) #74473
  • Code action "Allow unsafe code in this project" has no effect #74472

PullRequests

Updated

  • Move suppressions to code instead of .gdnsuppress #74467
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix issue with ForAttributeWithMetadataName being in an inconsistent state after a match. #74468
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [C#] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants as optimized as `+` operator (for string type) #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve error recovery for null coalescing assignment operator #74218
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
